# code-flowchart README

Generate flowchart direct from your code.

## Features
- convert JS into flowchart
- access from context menu(just when there is a javascript file) :: Show JS Flowchart 
- access from comand :: Show JS Flowchart


## Extension Settings

For now there is none.

## Known Issues
- Not working with ```jsx```, it will recognize as a javascript file, but the ```xml``` on jsx will breack the parser.

## Release Notes

Users appreciate release notes as you update your extension.

### 1.0.0

Initial release of 'Code Flowchart'
- Javascript converter
